Torra demana el vot per JxCat perquè és "l'enemic que Madrid vol abatre"
Borràs insta ERC a "recapacitar" i afirma que "qui no vol la unitat, no prioritza la independència"

07 Nov 2019, 20:44

El mateix dia que la premsa publica que el sumari de l’operació Judes vincula el president, Quim Torra, amb els CDR i l’endemà que Pedro Sánchez es vantés de controlar la fiscalia per portar l’excap de l’executiu exiliat, Carles Puigdemont, a Espanya –tot i rectificar després–, JxCat ha demanat el vot perquè considera que és la formació que l’Estat té més interès a debilitar. El president de la Generalitat, Quim Torra, que ha desmentit les informacions que el vinculen als CDR, ha demanat el vot per la candidatura de Laura Borràs perquè és la "més determinada" i l'"enemic a abatre", autoincloent-se "modestament en aquesta llista", pel poder de Madrid. 
Seguint la mateixa línia, el cap de llista de Tarragona, Ferran Bel, ha dit que el tracte que té la premsa de Madrid envers Catalunya, i els personatges que assenyala -ha dit-, posant d'exemple Mas, Puigdemont i Torra, també han de ser una motivació per anar a les urnes a votar JxCat. El president del grup parlamentari, Albert Batet, també ha insistit que qui molesta a Madrid és Puigdemont i que, això, a parer seu, s'ha demostrat aquesta setmana quan el president espanyol en funcions, Pedro Sánchez, l'ha situat en la "diana". "Davant l'atac persistent, hem de respondre amb vots", ha conclòs.
Batet ha definit com a "vot útil" l'opció de JxCat, davant d'altres "d'inútils". I ha citat dos exemples, en al·lusió a Esquerra i a la CUP, que la formació que lidera Laura Borràs ja va criticar ahir a Girona. "Són inútils els vots que són a canvi de res (...). També els que diuen que ho bloquejaran tot", ha afirmat Batet, que ha demanat als assistents votar amb "intel·ligència".
Albert Batet titlla de "vot inútil" el suport a ERC i la CUP
Després de passar el dia a Amer amb la família Puigdemont -l'expresident no ha participat en el míting arran de la mort del seu pare-, Batet ha volgut mostrar també el seu "orgull" de pertànyer al projecte de l'expresident exiliat, malgrat l'amalgama de sensibilitats que integra. "Ens uneixen valors i els representen molt bé els tres presidents", ha dit, posant en valor Mas com a "convergent" i Torra com a independent "que surt de la seva zona de les comoditats personals" en els "moments transcendents". També la "fermesa" i la "persistència" de Puigdemont. Seguidament, ha demanat "votar amb intel·ligència" en les pròximes eleccions del 10 de novembre, carregant –com ja va fer ahir JxCat a Girona– contra Esquerra i la CUP. 
La cap de llista, Laura Borràs, ha tornat a oferir "unitat" a Esquerra: "¿Hem vingut a celebrar victòries de partit o derrotes de país?". Borràs ha demanat formar un grup únic independentista a Madrid que representi la "majoria republicana de Catalunya". "Encara estem esperant un sí", ha tornat a insistir dirigint-se a ERC. La candidata ha demanat als republicans que "recapacitin", perquè "els presos i els exiliats són de tots". I ha conclòs: "Qui no vol la unitat, no prioritza la independència. I nosaltres volem la unitat".
Mas exigeix a Sánchez que "segui i parli"
L'expresident Artur Mas ha assegurat que el "problema d'Espanya no es resoldrà a còpia de repetir eleccions", sinó quan afronti el "conflicte democràtic que li planteja una bona part de Catalunya". "La solució és sit and talk", ha sentenciat contundent, asseverant que perquè això passi s'han de "reforçar els projectes independentistes i, en concret, el de JxCat".




JxCat demana el vot perquè Puigdemont és "l'enemic que vol batre" Madrid / JULIO DÍAZ / JXCAT

Per a Mas, cal premiar la força independentista que ha defensat la "unitat" que "la gent demana al carrer". "És important que la gent que demana unitat als partits entengui que hi ha un espai polític que s'ha esforçat fins a les últimes conseqüències per fer-ho", ha expressat Mas. L'expresident també ha contestat l'article que Sánchez ha fet en diversos diaris europeus, en què afirmava que l'independentisme "desestabilitza" els valors europeus.
En un discurs que ha anat in crescendo, Mas ha enumerat el que considera que sí que va en contra de la UE: "Desestabilitza Europa que el president en funcions digui que la Fiscalia depèn d'ell, que el govern espanyol vulgui intervenir les comunicacions a internet, o que líders polítics es passin dos anys en presó preventiva sent innocents. Això sí que es carrega els principis fonamentals d'Europa, que volem que li digui a Madrid que segui i parli", ha exclamat l'expresident Mas.

Torra asks for the vote for JxCat because it is "the enemy that Madrid wants to lower"
Borràs urges ERC to "reconsider" and affirms that "who does not want the unit, does not prioritize independence"

07 Nov 2019, 20:44

The same day that the press publishes that the summary of the operation Judas connects the president, Quim Torra, with the CDR and the following day that Pedro Sanchez was overcome to control the office of the public prosecutor to carry the former executive exiled, Carles Puigdemont, in Spain - despite rectifying it later -, JxCat has asked for the vote because it considers that it is the formation that the State has more interest in debilitating. The president of the Generalitat, Quim Torra, who denied the information that links it to the CoR, asked for the vote for the candidature of Laura Borràs because it is the "most determined" and the "enemy to be abolished", self-inclusion " modestly in this list ", by the power of Madrid.
Following the same line, the head of the list of Tarragona, Ferran Bel, said that the deal that has the Madrid press about Catalonia, and the characters he points out - he said - by example, Mas, Puigdemont and Torra, too They must be a motivation to go to the polls to vote JxCat. The president of the parliamentary group, Albert Batet, also insisted that the one who molests in Madrid is Puigdemont and that, in his opinion, has been shown this week when the Spanish president in functions, Pedro Sánchez, has placed it in the "diana". "Given the persistent attack, we have to respond with votes," he concluded.
Batet has defined as a "useful vote" the option of JxCat, in front of others "useless". And he cited two examples, in reference to Esquerra and the CUP, that the training led by Laura Borràs already criticized yesterday in Girona. "The votes that are in exchange for nothing (...) are also useless. Also, those who say they will block everything," said Batet, who asked assistants to vote with "intelligence."
Albert Batet says of "useless vote" support for ERC and the CUP
After spending the day in Amer with the Puigdemont family - the president has not participated in the meeting as a result of the death of his father - Batet also wanted to show his "pride" to belong to the project of the exiled ex-president, despite the amalgam of sensitivities that it integrates. "We share values and represent the three presidents very well," he said, valuing Mas as a "convergent" and Torra as an independent "out of his personal comfort zone" in the "transcendent moments". Also the "firmness" and the "persistence" of Puigdemont. Next, he asked to "vote with intelligence" in the next elections on November 10, loading - as JxCat yesterday did in Girona - against Esquerra and the CUP.
The head of the list, Laura Borràs, has once again offered "unity" to Esquerra: "Have we come to celebrate party victories or defeats in the country?" Borràs has called for the formation of a single independent group in Madrid that represents the "Republican majority of Catalonia". "We are still waiting for a yes," he insisted again, addressing ERC. The candidate has asked Republicans to "reconsider", because "prisoners and exiles are everyone". And he concluded: "Whoever does not want unity does not prioritize independence. And we want unity."
More demands that Sánchez "follow and talk"
Former President Artur Mas said that "the problem of Spain will not be resolved with a copy of repeating elections", but rather when confronting the "democratic conflict that is posed by a good part of Catalonia". "The solution is sit and talk," he said convincingly, asserting that to do so would have to "strengthen the pro-independence projects, and specifically, that of JxCat."




JxCat asks the vote because Puigdemont is "the enemy who wants to beat" Madrid / JULIO DÍAZ / JXCAT

For Mas, it is necessary to reward the independentist force that has defended the "unity" that "people demand in the street." "It is important that people who demand unity in the parties understand that there is a political space that has strived for the last consequences to do so," Mas said. The former president has also answered the article that Sánchez has done in several European newspapers, in which he affirmed that the independence movement "destabilizes" the European values.
In a speech that has been growing, Mas has listed what he considers to be against the EU: "Europe destabilizes that the acting president says that the Office of the Prosecutor's Office depends on him, that the Spanish government wants to intervene communications On the Internet, or what political leaders spend two years in preventive jail, they are innocent. That is what upholds the fundamental principles of Europe, which we want to tell Madrid to follow and speak, "ex-president Mas exclaimed.
